thread.title: Watch: Rajkummar Rao's 'Trapped' trailer will give you goosebumps!
thread.title_full: Watch: Rajkummar Rao's 'Trapped' trailer will give you goosebumps! - Entertainment

author: mid-day online correspondent
title: Watch: Rajkummar Rao's 'Trapped' trailer will give you goosebumps!
text:
Rajkummar Rao in a still from 'Trapped' trailer. Pics/YouTube 
The trailer of Vikramaditya Motwane's 'Trapped' featuring Rajkummar Rao is out and it is sure to leave you intrigued!
WATCH 'TRAPPED' TRAILER: 

Did you like the trailer? Tell us what you think in comments below.

Rajkummar Rao in a still from 'Trapped' trailer 
Rajkummar Rao went through a physically and emotionally draining process to essay his role in 'Trapped'.
"I was living on carrot and black coffee for 'Trapped'. As we finished shooting the film within 20 days, to get under the skin of the character I didn't eat properly and felt the frustration and anxiety of the character I play in the film," Rajkummar Rao told media at the trailer launch event on Wednesday in Mumbai.
"We approached the character very organically to get it right," he added.

Rajkummar Rao in a still from 'Trapped' trailer 
The story of 'Trapped' is woven around a young man, played by Rajkummar Rao, who is trapped in a room of a non-functional building for quite some time.
Filming it was challenging for the actor and director.
While Motwane had to deal with the challenges of shooting in one room, Rajkummar said he "felt lucky to play the part".
'Trapped' is slated to release on March 17.
